welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aubagne, France! Get ready to be enchanted by the quaint streets, Provençal charm, and rich history this city has to offer. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Aubagne is known for. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Castellet Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Castellet Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
